game.name: Train Simulator: Ostbahn: Wien Hbf - Hegyeshalom - Bratislava-Petrzalka Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: One route, three flags! This fascinating route takes you across three international borders, with destinations in Austria, Hungary and Slovakia. The Ostbahn dates back to the 19th Century and the early spread of European railway infrastructure.
game.shortDescriptionEn: One route, three flags! This fascinating route takes you across three international borders, with destinations in Austria, Hungary and Slovakia. The Ostbahn dates back to the 19th Century and the early spread of European railway infrastructure.
